title: Git basics to get up and running
description: Learn about git and all the basic commands you need to know, to be able to confidently work on projects without the fear of making irreversible mistakes.

title: AWS Lambda: Getting started
description: We take a look at AWS Lambda, AWS's own serverless solution, using a simple project to get familiar with it.

title: Basic CI/CD Setup with Github and Gitlab
description: Life would be so much easier, if you could just focus on developing and someone else could handle testing and deployment for you *wink*.
